00059     class ConnectionState : public ReferenceCount {
00060     public:
00061       bool                connected;
00062       InetAddr            addr;
00063       InetAddr            local_addr;
00064       uint32_t            timeout_ms;
00065       DispatchHandlerPtr  handler;
00066       Mutex               mutex;
00067       boost::condition    cond;
00068       boost::xtime        next_retry;
00069       std::string         service_name;
00070     };
00071     typedef intrusive_ptr<ConnectionState> ConnectionStatePtr;
00072 
00073 
00074     struct LtConnectionState {
00075       bool operator()(const ConnectionStatePtr &cs1,
00076                       const ConnectionStatePtr &cs2) const {
00077         return xtime_cmp(cs1->next_retry, cs2->next_retry) >= 0;
00078       }
00079     };
00080 
00081     struct SharedImpl {
00082       Comm              *comm;
00083       Mutex              mutex;
00084       boost::condition   retry_cond;
00085       boost::thread     *thread;
00086       SockAddrMap<ConnectionStatePtr>  conn_map;
00087       std::priority_queue<ConnectionStatePtr, std::vector<ConnectionStatePtr>,
00088           LtConnectionState> retry_queue;
00089       bool quiet_mode;
00090     };
00091 
00097     ConnectionManager(Comm *comm = 0) {
00098       m_impl = new SharedImpl;
00099       m_impl->comm = comm ? comm : Comm::instance();
00100       m_impl->thread = new boost::thread(*this);
00101       m_impl->quiet_mode = false;
00102     }
00103 
00107     ConnectionManager(const ConnectionManager &cm) {
00108       m_impl = cm.m_impl;
00109       intrusive_ptr_add_ref(this);
00110     }

00116       return;
00117     }
